Hello! I am new to working with the serverless functions within HubSpot and I was wondering if anyone could help me navigate resolving an error that I received when I tried to run `hs secrets list` . This is the error I received:
```[ERROR] A StatusCodeError has occurred. 403 - {"status":"error","message":"This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.","correlationId":"a3f22649-8766-41a8-ad59-3782e197ffe9","errors":[{"message":"One or more of the following scopes are required.","context":{"requiredScopes":[]}}],"links":{"scopes":"<https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>"},"category":"MISSING_SCOPES","requestId":"29148821-1104-4074-bd2f-45c51fe1e732"}```
The account I am creating the function on is using CMS Hub Enterprise. Any help would be much appreciated!
hi Matt, we are looking to import some data from our source - a data mgmt platform - to your platform in order to enrich data available for features like page content dynamization and A/B testing

<@U011DL81GAY> you'll need to go through the auth flow for the portal again to generate a personal access key that has permission to use serverless functions. You should be able to do this via `hs auth personalaccesskey` and deactivating the existing key.
when generating the key, you'll also want to make sure that "Serverless functions" is checked.
i also filed an issue for the CLI to improve the messaging here: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-tools/issues/177>

<@U22VBL87M> Thank you so much! I really appreciate you taking the time to look into this and I am loving the serverless function addition to HubSpot so far. The time and energy it takes to get a custom function up and running is so much lower than what I have experienced with similar projects in the past! :+1:
glad to hear it! we want to keep making it better so be sure to share feedback.
